function.name: package_legal_documents
function.description: Create a ZIP package containing multiple legal documents. Useful for bundling a complete case file or Tenant Protection Packet for download or sharing.

document_ids.description: Array of document IDs to include in the package

document_urls.description: Alternative: Array of document URLs to include

package_name.description: Name for the ZIP package (without .zip extension)

docket_number.description: Court docket number - appended to package name if provided

client_name.description: Client name - appended to package name if provided

include_readme.description: Whether to include a README file with document list and instructions

include_filing_checklist.description: Whether to include a filing checklist document

package_id.description: Unique identifier for the ZIP package

package_url.description: URL to download the ZIP package

file_count.description: Number of files in the package

total_size.description: Total size of the package (formatted string)

contents.description: List of files included in the package
